document_title: Placental abruption: Causes, signs, diagnosis, treatment
subsection_name: nhau-bong-non.json_4_Does pregnant woman bleed during placental abruption?
subsection_content:
In most cases of placental abruption, vaginal bleeding will be seen, except in cases of occult placental abruption, only when the placenta is removed after birth will a small hematoma be seen.
"When you notice vaginal bleeding or any other unusual symptoms during pregnancy, pregnant women need to immediately go to the hospital to be examined and determine the exact cause for timely and effective intervention and treatment." , Dr. Ngoc Anh shared more.
